name: Slash'em
description:
A simple top-down mob slashing game originally made in the span of 3 hours using Godot 4 Beta 9!

Then added to greatly over about 36 more hours, lol!

Controls Keyboard

W,A,S,D - Movement
SPACE - Attack

Gamepad

LEFT THUMB STICK - Movement
(A) - Attack

Attribution

Game coded by ObsidianBlk

Using graphics pack 1-Bit Pack, by Kenney ( CC0 )

Sound Effect Artists Used

sturmankin ( License: CC0 )
J. Zazvurek ( License: CC4.0 )
Rob_Marion ( License: CC0 )

Music Artist Used

Ronhul Maggot - They Are Coming ( License: CC4.0 )

Game Source

The source for Slash'em can be downloaded from it's Github Repo
